creator: mtyler68@yahoo.com
text:
The attribute documentation for the <jspc> task is missing both the webinc and 
webxml attributes. I checked the source code and found setters and getters for 
these attributes. This information may be helpful to someone in the future. 
Thanks.

Might indeed be useful 'in the future'. I checked usage and unless I'm wrong 
(or IDEA is wrong should I say - it cannot be me ;-) this code is not used at 
all right now anywhere.

We'll keep this one hidden and get it out of our hat once it is used, for now 
it won't be useful to users to have the description of fields that are not 
used :)

Seriously, Jasper is obviously missing usage of -webinc and -webxml.

Steve and Costin, you're the jspc gurus out there. Speak up ! Do we add this or 
not ?
creator: sbailliez@apache.org
jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
text:
These attributes are documented in Appendix E of Java Development with Ant, as
it was generated directly from the source code.  This PDF file is in Ant's docs
directory.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
so the real defect is 'jasperc.java' doesnt use the webinf/webxml params; the
fact that they arent widely documented is a good thing. But they should be
docoed and supported, since they are halfway there.
Steve seems to have forgotten to close this. Fixed since 2002-12-01.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
